summary.title: Summary assessment {oeCode} for {user}
summary.no_final_result: There isn't a calculated endresult yet
summary.no_form_result: There isn't a calculated result yet
summary.finalize_mark_confirm: Are you sure that you want to complete this assessment? You cannot adjust the assessment once completed.

assessment.disabled: This form is in read-only mode because the parent assessment has been finalized

settings.terms_instead_of_numbers_explanation: Show terms (excellent, good, etc.) instead of numbers (4, 6, etc.) when filling out a form
settings.language_explanation: Change the language of the app to the language of your choice

error.loading: There was a problem with loading the data. Please refresh the page to try again
error.menu: There was a problem with loading the menu. Please refresh the page to try again
error.new_assessment_save: Something went wrong on saving the assessment
error.new_assessment_validation_first_step: You didn't choose a template, student or course
error.new_assessment_validation_second_step: You didn't fill out all the fields
error.new_assessment_validation_date: The startdate can't be after the enddate
error.answer_save: Something went wrong on saving the answer
error.comment_save: Something went wrong on saving the comment
error.setting_save: Something went wrong on saving the preference
error.mark_final: Your assessment couldn't be made final. Please try again
error.get_summary: Something went wrong on retrieving the summary
error.login_400: Your username and/of password isn't correct
error.login_500: Something went wrong on communicating with the server. Please try again
error.wrong_examinator_id: Only the teacher that created this assessment can complete it.
error.finalize_assessment: Something went wrong completing the assessment
